languages.text: "При всех достоинствах единицы трудно предположить, что его преемник будет менее эффективен на посту Вольного Торговца. Усопший демонстрировал высшее равнодушие к своим обязанностям".
"Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."
languages.original_text: "При всех достоинствах единицы трудно предположить, что его преемник будет менее эффективен на посту Вольного Торговца. Усопший демонстрировал высшее равнодушие к своим обязанностям".

traits.locale_text: "Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."

"Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."
"Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."

languages.text: “无论那个单位有什么优点，他的继任者身为行商浪人的效率，都不太可能比他更低，因为那个已被消灭的单位极度漠视他的职责。”
languages.original_text: "Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."

traits.locale_text: “无论那个单位有什么优点，他的继任者身为行商浪人的效率，都不太可能比他更低，因为那个已被消灭的单位极度漠视他的职责。”

languages.text: « Quels que soient les mérites de l'unité, il est peu probable que son successeur s'avère moins efficace au poste de libre-marchand. Le défunt faisait preuve d'une indifférence suprême envers ses devoirs. »
languages.original_text: "Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."

traits.locale_text: « Quels que soient les mérites de l'unité, il est peu probable que son successeur s'avère moins efficace au poste de libre-marchand. Le défunt faisait preuve d'une indifférence suprême envers ses devoirs. »

languages.text: «Independientemente de sus méritos, es poco probable que la unidad sucesora consiga ser menos eficaz como Comerciante Independiente. El difunto mostraba una indiferencia plena hacia sus deberes».
languages.original_text: "Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."

traits.locale_text: «Independientemente de sus méritos, es poco probable que la unidad sucesora consiga ser menos eficaz como Comerciante Independiente. El difunto mostraba una indiferencia plena hacia sus deberes».

languages.text: 「当該ユニットの長所が何であれ、その後継者は自由開拓者としての影響力を削がれることはなさそうだ。故人は己の聖務に対し極めて無関心であった」
languages.original_text: "Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."

traits.locale_text: 「当該ユニットの長所が何であれ、その後継者は自由開拓者としての影響力を削がれることはなさそうだ。故人は己の聖務に対し極めて無関心であった」

languages.text: "Welche Verdienste die Einheit auch hatte, es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass ihr Nachfolger als Freihändler weniger effektiv sein könnte. Der Verstorbene hat eine außergewöhnliche Gleichgültigkeit gegenüber seinen Pflichten an den Tag gelegt."
languages.original_text: "Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."

traits.locale_text: "Welche Verdienste die Einheit auch hatte, es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass ihr Nachfolger als Freihändler weniger effektiv sein könnte. Der Verstorbene hat eine außergewöhnliche Gleichgültigkeit gegenüber seinen Pflichten an den Tag gelegt."

languages.original_text: "Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."

languages.text: "Birimin başarı seviyesi fark etmeksizin halefinin Hür Tacir olarak daha kötü iş çıkarması, uzak bir ihtimal olarak gözüküyor. Rahmetli, görevlerine karşı aşırı derecede ilgisizdi."
languages.original_text: "Whatever the unit's merits, it is unlikely that his successor could be less effective as Rogue Trader. The deceased displayed supreme indifference to his duties."

traits.locale_text: "Birimin hak ettiği şey her neyse halefinin Hür Tacir olarak daha az becerikli olması uzak bir ihtimal olarak gözüküyor. Rahmetli, görevlerine karşı aşırı derecede ilgisizdi."
